title: Easy Server Monitor Complete 2.2
description:
*******************************************************************************
              Easy Server Monitor Complete 2.2 (c) 2009 Dave Andrews
*******************************************************************************


Release: Easy Server Monitor Complete 2.2

Date: 13/03/2009

Cracked By: Nixkap



Type.................: Utility
Platform.............: XP/W2K3/Vista
Serial #.............: No
Compression Format...: None
Copy Protection......: Trial


RELEASE NOTES

        
	This program allows an administrator to remotely monitor the servers
	in his or her organization for uptime, hard drive space, running services
	and processes. 

	It can run as a background service and send email alerts when a server
	needs attention. 

	Intended to be easy to learn and easy to use yet still effective in
	its job. 

	Many programs monitor the network but have a high learning curve. 

	This one makes monitoring easy. Services and processes such as your 
	database system, email server, and network file storage are critical
	to your infrastructure and business. 

	Now you can visually see and be alerted immediately if any of them are
	having problems.
	

FEATURES


 	* See what services are running immediately with simple visual cues!

    	* Monitor your hard disks' free and used space, and receive immediate
	reports if any hard drives are reaching their capacity.

    	* Watch your services to make sure important business processes do not
	go down. Easy Server Monitor Complete monitors them for you!

    	* Be informed as to the uptime of all servers, and export the runtime
	data into Excel or any other CSV-enabled spreadsheet program for easy
	reporting!

 
For More Info on Easy Server Monitor Complete 2.2 Visit:
       <a href=" http://www.daveandrews.org" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.daveandrews.org</a>


INSTALLATION NOTES

	- Run InstallServerMonitor.exe
	- Copy the content of .Crack into the main app folder
